name: Jeff's Dog
description:
A platformer in which you play as Jeff in a quest to rescue his lost dog.

Except Jeff isn't a very big fan of being controlled, so takes away your control to move him left and right, and tries to do it himself.

Guide Jeff as he recklessly charges up a mountain, by making him jump, and vanquishing any zombies in the way.

Be careful not to fall down, or be killed by Jeff's zombie neighbour Gary, and you will succeed
